summary: i heard a rumor that s3 is gonna have 20-30 eps and have a 3a and 3b like season 2 hmmm i guess nothing is confirmed yet but ill...
question: i heard a rumor that s3 is gonna have 20-30 eps and have a 3a and 3b like season 2 hmmm i guess nothing is confirmed yet but ill be kinda sad if it's half that long
answer:
It’s probably safe to assume 20-30.

I’ve talked with @mackmeta about this a little. He found out that the show’s production has put out casting notices for extras through the end of 2018. Things change, obviously, and it’s not that hard to cancel on a bunch of extras, but the assumption is that they plan on being in production until then. If that’s the case, we’re of the belief at the moment that they’re aiming to shoot somewhere around 21 episodes, which is about what season 2′s episode count would’ve been before they got the extra tax break from the Utah government and added a handful more episodes. (They could be hoping for another similar tax break this year, but I haven’t seen any news on it. If they haven’t gotten it yet, and were still waiting on it, they’d need to know about it soon so they can begin planning for the extra episodes.)

Piecing together clues from the amount of episodes they’ve shot thus far, production should be aiming to film episodes 3.11, 3.12, and 3.13 in September when they return from this two week break they’re on.

13 episodes is one of the standard episode orders for a cable show, but if season 3′s episode order was cut down that drastically from season 2, it would almost assuredly be the series finale, and, if that was the case, almost everyone on the show, including Josh, would probably know. They would have to actively be working towards that. Storylines would need to start getting wrapped up and they would need to be building toward the big finale. Not that any of us are on-set – all we can really do is just guess based on social media – but I feel like we’d sort of know, you know? If this was all about to end in the next few weeks.

So, we’ll see. We’ll definitely learn more soon. If they get another tax break, we’ll hopefully see some press release or news article about it. If they keep shooting into October, then we’ll know they’ve probably made it past that episode 13 marker.

(EDIT: As always, mackmeta knows more than I do. Very deep dive post here if you want to read some more.)

blog.name: jyrusisdead
blog.title: you're making it sound so romantic
blog.description: 16//gay and living//wattpad&ao3: @iamatheatrekid

summary: Day 4: Favorite Jyrus Scene
body:
Day 4: Favorite Jyrus Scene

Hm. Favorite jyrus scene? How can I pick. I feel like one of my favorites was always that one after the Space Otters game. When Jonah came over and was like “Cyrus, you’re awesome!” And they have cider.

When Cyrus did that little smirk at Jonah that was just a little nod to the shippers that Cyrus totally likes Jonah

summary: Tyrus fluff prompt– Just a day in the life of Tyrus with them texting in the morning and walking to school together, lunch...
question: Tyrus fluff prompt– Just a day in the life of Tyrus with them texting in the morning and walking to school together, lunch together, Cyrus at T.J. and Buffy's practice after school, the spoon, the swings, just everything together except they're both "just friends" heavily pining after each other. .  And small touches, all day. Sitting closer than necessary. T.J. wrapping his arm around Cyrus. Just Tyrus Fluff. They don't even have to be together at the end.
answer:
I’m gonna do this in a different format than I usually do, I hope that’s fine!

(Also I’m turning this into a secret relationship fic sorry I couldn’t help myself)

7:30 am: Like clockwork, Cyrus was woken by TJ’s phone call.

“Good morning, Cyrus!” he chirped happily when Cyrus picked up the phone.

“Hi, love. How was your weekend?” Cyrus asked, getting out of bed reluctantly. He rubbed his eyes and padded across the room to his closet.

“It was okay, I missed you though,” TJ pouted into the phone. Cyrus found the shirt he’d been looking for and pulled it off the hanger with a a loud cry of victory. “What just happened over there?”

“Hm? Oh, I just found the shirt I’ve been looking for,” Cyrus explained, as if it were the most obvious answer to TJ’s question.

“Oh, of course. How could I have been so thoughtless?” TJ remarked drily. “Anyway, I’m on my way now. I’ll be there in 15 minutes.”

“Yay! I’ll see you in fifteen, love you!”

“Love you too, Underdog,” TJ hung up the phone, stepping out of his house and onto the sidewalk, shivering in the cold.

7:49 am: TJ knocked on Cyrus’s front door, and was welcomed into the home by Cyrus’s mom.

“Good morning, Dr. Goodman. Cyrus told me you and your husband have an anniversary coming up?” TJ greeted politely.

“Yes, we do! Next Thursday, to be precise,” Mrs. Goodman responded.

“Congratulations! I’ll have to keep that in mind,” TJ smiled warmly.

“Cyrus will be down in just a few moments, would you like some tea?”

“Oh, no thank you.”

“I’m going to get you to take the tea one day, you know,” Mrs. Goodman joked.

“Mom! Please! Stop pestering TJ to take the tea!” Cyrus jogged downstairs, smiling at his secrect boyfriend.

“Hey, Underdog. You ready to go?”

“Yep! Bye, mom!” Cyrus kissed his mom on the cheek.

“Bye, Cyrus. Have a good day!”

Cyrus walked out the door, and TJ followed, smiling at Mrs. Goodman as he closed the door behind him.

7:54 am: TJ took Cyrus’s hand as they walked towards the school.

“I missed you this weekend,” Cyrus said, looking up at TJ.

“I missed you too, Underdog,” TJ smiled, leaning over to kiss Cyrus’s forehead.

“We’re adorable.”

“I know we are.”

8:17 am: TJ reluctantly dropped Cyrus’s hand when they approached the school.

“I love you, have a good day. I’ll see you at lunch?” TJ asked.

“Yep! I can’t wait, I love you too,” Cyrus quickly kissed him goodbye, and then walked into school.

12:03 pm: TJ looked around the lunchroom, before his eyes fell on his boyfriend and his boyfriend’s friends.

“Hey, Underdog!” he sat down next to Cyrus. Cyrus immediately moved closer to his boyfriend, effectively earning the raised eyebrows of Buffy and Andi.  

“You two are weird,” Buffy whispered, oblivious to the fact that she and Andi were almost exactly mirroring Cyrus and TJ, Andi curled up in her arms.

“Andi is basically in your lap!” Cyrus defended.

“Yeah, but she’s my… No way!” Buffy suddenly connected the dots in her head. “You’re- but- WHAT?” she looked back and forth between the boys sitting across from them. 

“Ha! They figured it out! Pay up, Underdog,” Cyrus begrudgingly handed his boyfriend a five dollar bill, which TJ accepted triumphantly.

4:09 pm: TJ wandered up to the swings, sitting down next to his boyfriend.
“Hey, Underdog. I thought you went home!“ 

“I almost did, but I needed to think,” Cyrus responded. 

“Oh, do you want me to go? Because I get it if you want to be alone,” TJ started to stand up from his swing, but Cyrus held him my the wrist.

“No! Please, stay! I want you here.”

“Oh, okay,” TJ sat back down on his swing. “What are you thinking about?”

“I just- I think I want to come out to my parents, and tell them about us.”

“Oh. Oh!” TJ exclaimed. 

“Is that okay? I don’t have to if you don’t want me to,” Cyrus said, though he looked sad at the prospect of keeping his secret.

“No! That’s not really my thing, Cyrus. I don’t get to decide this for you, but if you decide you do want to come out,  I’ll be by your side- figuratively and, if you want, literally- the whole time.”

“You’d really do that for me?”

“I’d do anything for you."

“Hey, Underdog!” he sat down next to Cyrus. Cyrus immediately moved closer to his boyfriend, effectively earning the raised eyebrows of Buffy and Andi.  

“You two are weird,” Buffy whispered, oblivious to the fact that she and Andi were almost exactly mirroring Cyrus and TJ, Andi curled up in her arms.

“Andi is basically in your lap!” Cyrus defended.

“Yeah, but she’s my… No way!” Buffy suddenly connected the dots in her head. “You’re- but- WHAT?” she looked back and forth between the boys sitting across from them. 

“Ha! They figured it out! Pay up, Underdog,” Cyrus begrudgingly handed his boyfriend a five dollar bill, which TJ accepted triumphantly.

4:09 pm: TJ wandered up to the swings, sitting down next to his boyfriend.
“Hey, Underdog. I thought you went home!“ 

“I almost did, but I needed to think,” Cyrus responded. 

“Oh, do you want me to go? Because I get it if you want to be alone,” TJ started to stand up from his swing, but Cyrus held him my the wrist.

“No! Please, stay! I want you here.”

“Oh, okay,” TJ sat back down on his swing. “What are you thinking about?”

“I just- I think I want to come out to my parents, and tell them about us.”

“Oh. Oh!” TJ exclaimed. 

“Is that okay? I don’t have to if you don’t want me to,” Cyrus said, though he looked sad at the prospect of keeping his secret.

“No! That’s not really my thing, Cyrus. I don’t get to decide this for you, but if you decide you do want to come out,  I’ll be by your side- figuratively and, if you want, literally- the whole time.”

“You’d really do that for me?”

“I’d do anything for you."
trail.content_abstract:
I’m gonna do this in a different format than I usually do, I hope that’s fine!

(Also I’m turning this into a secret relationship fic sorry I couldn’t help myself)

7:30 am: Like clockwork, Cyrus was woken by TJ’s phone call.

“Good morning, Cyrus!” he chirped happily when Cyrus picked up the phone.

“Hi, love. How was your weekend?” Cyrus asked, getting out of bed reluctantly. He rubbed his eyes and padded across the room to his closet.

“It was okay, I missed you though,” TJ pouted into the phone. Cyrus found the shirt he’d been looking for and pulled it off the hanger with a a loud cry of victory. “What just happened over there?”

“Hm? Oh, I just found the shirt I’ve been looking for,” Cyrus explained, as if it were the most obvious answer to TJ’s question.

“Oh, of course. How could I have been so thoughtless?” TJ remarked drily. “Anyway, I’m on my way now. I’ll be there in 15 minutes.”

“Yay! I’ll see you in fifteen, love you!”

“Love you too, Underdog,” TJ hung up the phone, stepping out of his house and onto the sidewalk, shivering in the cold.

summary: So I found this little ship chart in the Andi Mack tag and decided to do it because why not? (Also to pretty much establish what...
body:
So I found this little ship chart in the Andi Mack tag and decided to do it because why not? (Also to pretty much establish what I do and don’t ship to everyone who didn’t already know lmao)

Lemme sum it up for those who are too lazy to look at everything:

OTP: Jyrus, Muffy & Wandi

Ship: Bandi & Tyrus

Kinda: Juffy, Ambi & Bamber

Don’t Care: Walrus, Wonah, Wuffy & Tuffy

NO: Jandi, Ciris & Jamber

I probably skipped MANY ships but I don’t care about them, or ship them anyways, so it doesn’t matter.

summary: ok so there is this Israeli website where teens can ask questions and get answers and it can be on any subject even tj shows so...
body:
ok so there is this Israeli website where teens can ask questions and get answers and it can be on any subject even tj shows so i asked “does anyone watch andi Mack here? who do you ship? tuffy or tyrus?” i had like two comments and they both said tuffy??? and i was like… not to disrespect your ship just WHY.

so this one girl is saying “they are so cute especially bc they were enemies” and i’m just here like… ok so you’re saying that if a guy bullies you you should date him??? i’m sorry i just want to find some logic
